# parseSnapshotInputs() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function parseSnapshotInputs(inputs: SnapshotInput): Promise<
  {
    address: string;
    maxClaimable: string;
    price?: string | undefined;
    currencyAddress?: string | undefined;
  }[]
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                    | Description |
| --------- | --------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| inputs    | [SnapshotInput](./sdk.snapshotinput.md) |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ address: string; maxClaimable: string; price?: string \| undefined; currencyAddress?: string \| undefined; }\[\]&gt;
